clinical_study.brief_title: cfDNA in Diagnosis and Differential Diagnosis of Ovarian Endometriosis
clinical_study.official_title: Methylation of cfDNA in Diagnosis and Differential Diagnosis of Ovarian Endometriosis

brief_summary.textblock: Methylation detection of circulating free DNA to identify markers for diagnosis and differential diagnosis of ovarian endometriosis.

detailed_description.textblock: Methylation detection of circulating free DNA and FFPF samples from patients with ovarian endometriosis, ovarian cancer and other benign ovarian cysts will be performed to select markers for ovarian endometriosis diagnosis. The markers will be validated in patients with ovarian cysts found by ultrasound. The diagnosis accuracy of the markers will be evaluated by comparing with the pathological diagnosis.

primary_outcome.measure: The efficacy of cfDNA methylation in the diagnosis of ovarian endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: The sensitivity, specificity and accuracy are calculated according to standard definitions to evaluate the efficacy of cfDNA methylation in the diagnosis of ovarian endometriosis

arm_group.description: Methalation detection of circulating free DNA and FFPF samples from pathologically confirmed patients with ovarian endometriosis(30 cases), ovarian cancer (30 cases)and other benign ovarian tumors (30 cases)will be performed to select markers for ovarian endometriosis diagnosis.

The selected markers will be validated in patients with ovarian cysts (300 cases )found by ultrasound. The diagnosis accuracy of the markers will be evaluated by comparing with the pathological diagnosis.

biospec_descr.textblock: blood samples and FFPF samples in marker selection group; blood samples in marker validation group
